name: Wait, Paws, Rewind
description:
You are an adventurous kitty cat who has too much time on its paws after stealing an ancient artifact from the Egyptian Gods. Navigate through their temple to escape! 

Gameplay
Wait, Paws, Rewind is a third-person platform adventure game where you play as tin, the cat burglar who recently angered an Egyptian God. You must navigate the layout of the God's newly awakened temple to find a way out, using a time-warping hourglass to survive various statuesque enemies and deadly traps. Kill or dodge them to escape before the temple collapses. 

Controls
Wait, Paws, Rewind is both keyboard and gamepad compatible. 

Move: WASD or Left thumbstick
Look: Mouse or Right thumbstick
Dash/Attack: Shift or Left shoulder
Jump: Spacebar or Bottom face button
Pause: "P" or Start

Credits
